title: Quality & Queue Stats Extension
description: JSON Schema for quality_metrics and queue fields in /v1/stats response

quality_metrics.description: Per-agent quality metrics keyed by agent_id

AgentQualityMetrics.description: Quality health snapshot for a single agent

error_rate_1h.description: Fraction of failed requests in the last 1 hour

avg_ttft_ms.description: Average Time To First Token in milliseconds (1h window)

success_rate_24h.description: Fraction of successful requests in the last 24 hours

last_failure_ts.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of most recent failure, or null

request_count_1h.description: Total requests processed in the last 1 hour

QueueStatus.description: Current state of the request queue
